short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the browsing experience by changing the default search engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi Tab Buddy is an extension will change the default search engine functionality to Yahoo search.

Some important information for you:
-	By clicking on the 'Add to Chrome' button and installing Tab buddy extension, you are agreeing to install this extension, with our Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service. 
-	By installing, Tab buddy will change your Chrome's default search.
-	You may remove or disable this extension anytime.
-	Review our Terms of Service: https://newtaber.com/tos.html

Contact us! We'd love to hear from you: support@newtaber.com
